NAP projects require both the 2013 and 2015 Visual C++ redistributable packages installed.

Error message DLL: MSVCP140.DLL
Missing redistributable: 2015
Download: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=53587

Error message DLL: VCOMP120.DLL
Missing redistributable: 2013
Download: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/3138367/update-for-visual-c-2013-and-visual-c-redistributable-package
